meanings.definition: A gel electrophoresis technique used to separate proteins based on their molecular weight.
meanings.sent1: Scientists analyzed the zymograms to understand the sizes of different proteins.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician carefully examined the zymograms to identify the protein bands.
meanings.sent3: The zymograms looked like a colorful puzzle under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The zymograms revealed the hidden secrets of the protein composition.
meanings.sent5: The zymograms showed a clear picture of the protein distribution.

meanings.definition: The resulting pattern of separated proteins on a gel.
meanings.sent1: The zymograms displayed distinct bands representing different proteins.
meanings.sent2: Researchers compared the zymograms to determine the protein profiles.
meanings.sent3: The zymograms seemed to dance under the UV light in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The zymograms resembled a musical score of protein diversity.
meanings.sent5: The zymograms left a lasting impression of protein separation techniques.
